tips: Kill an enemy minion to restore 3% max HP worth of HP.
Dealing damage with skills increases physical attack by 5%. Lasts 3 seconds. This effect has a 6 second cooldown
Kill enemy minions to restore 2% max HP worth of HP and 3% max MP worth of MP.
Dealing damage with skills increases magic attack by 11~25 (increases with hero level). Lasts 3 seconds. This effect has a 6 second cooldown.
When health is below 40%, gains an increased 35 physical and magic defense
Crowd controlling a enemy grants 5% of max HP. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
Converts 0.40% of max HP to physical attack and magic attack
Kill jungle monsters hit by "Retribution" to earn an extra of 50 gold.

The slowing effect of Retribution will be increased by 20%. If the enemies receiving Retribution get killed, the user will gain 50 Gold. The subsequent situation increases the Gold that the user obtains by 10 Gold (up to 1100 Gold).
Increases damage dealt to Lord, Turtle and Turrets by 15%, damage taken from Lord and Turtle is reduced by 20%.
Kill an enemy hero to earn an extra 80 gold，up to 1200.
Increases damage by 6% on the enemy hero when he is the only nearby hero
Kill an enemy hero to restore 15% HP and increase movement speed by 20%. Lasts 5 seconds.
Purchase the equipment item for 90% gold.
When dealing damage that is more than 7% of target's max HP for 3 times in 5 seconds, burns the target 3 times, each burn dealing 82~250 Magic Damage. This effect has a 12 second cooldown.
Dealing damage with skills adds extra damage that equals to 4% of the target's current HP as Magic Damage and restores 3% of your Mana. This effect has a 5 second cooldown.
Every 1% of HP lost is converted to an additional 0.2% increase in damage (Up to 12% damage increase).
Gains 8% Spell Vamp. Killing every enemy hero grants an extra 1% Spell Vamp (Up to 12%).
After slowing Heroes or Creeps (by more than 20% for a single time), increases Physical Attack by 30%. Lasts 3s. The effect will be removed when dealing next Damage. Cooldown is 10s.
After dealing damage to an enemy hero, the damage dealt by allies on the enemy hero will be increased by 6% for 3 seconds. This effect has a 6 second cooldown.
Gains an extra 10 gold after dealing damage to enemy heroes (Up to 1200 gold). Cooldown is 4s.
Resurrecting time is reduced by 15%, battle spell cooldown is reduced by 15%.
Physical damage gained from equipment increased by 12%
Within 1.5s of dealing damage with Basic Attacks, movement speed is increased by 40% and regenerates HP equal to 30% of hero’s Physical Attack. Cooldown is 10s.
Basic attack has a 20% chance of reducing target's movement speed by 90% and attack speed by 50%. This effect has a 2 second cooldown(Not effective for melee heroes).
